thread.section_title: Kerry Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel with first class service at the heart of everything
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel with first class service at the heart of everything - Review of Kerry Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Stefan R
title: Excellent hotel with first class service at the heart of everything
text:
The hotel overall is a great place to stay in Beijing, close to local transport and convenient for airport or train to connect to elsewhere. High quality throughout and for business travellers, the Club rooms are perfect, including access to the Club Lounge and a range of services. Staff throughout are extremely friendly, helpful, and very capable. The team in the Club Lounge looks after guests in a highly competent and friendly manner, and Sammi Yu deserves special thanks and kudos, I do not believe there is any query or request that is not resolved with extreme courtesy and skill.
Room Tip: Go for Club rooms, the premium is definitely worth it. See more room tips
